Event.name: Cause_to_make_progress
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> works on a <fen>Project</fen> so that it reaches a more advanced and desirable state.
<ex><fex name="Agent">I</fex> <t>improve</t> <fex name="Project">FrameNet</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Project
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The object or idea that undergoes change due to the efforts of the <fen>Agent</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Post_state
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The state of the <fen>Project</fen> following an advance.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The time at which the progress occurs.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Rate
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The rate at which the change happens.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>A description of the progress, generally a description comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>); in addition, it may describe characteristics and states of the <fen>Agent</fen> that also affect the development. </def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>The period over which the <fen>Agent</fen> develops the <fen>Project</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The amount of advancement that the <fen>Project</fen> has attained.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Domain
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The relevant dimension of development.
<ex>We have <t>developed</t> our community <fex name="dom">economically</fex> in these last few years.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The individual that brings about the development of the <fen>Project</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location at which the the <fen>Project</fen> progresses. </def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The Explanation denotes a proposition from which the main clause (headed by the target) logically follows. </def-root>

Arg.name: Particular_iteration
Arg.definition: <def-root>Expressions marked with this extra-thematic FE modify a non-iterative use of the target, and indicate that it is conceived as embedded within an iterated series of similar events or states. </def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Purpose</fen> for which the <fen>Agent</fen> progresses the <fen>Project</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The action of the <fen>Agent</fen> which enables the advancement.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: develop.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: cause to become more advanced.

lexUnit.name: gains.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: progress made in a particular field.

lexUnit.name: perfect.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: cause development at the highest standard.

lexUnit.name: modernization.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the act of making up-to-date.

lexUnit.name: advance.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to cause to make headway on something
